snippet: The 33 1/3 Collective presents its “Bluebeard” at 3LD Art & Technology Center as part of the Prototype festival.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews theater-opera-music hybrid piece Bluebeard, created and performed by 33 1/3 Collective at 3LD Art & Technology Center as part of the Prototype Festival.
lead_paragraph: The 33 1/3 Collective presents its “Bluebeard” at 3LD Art & Technology Center as part of the Prototype festival.

headline.seo: ‘Bluebeard,’ by 331/3 Collective, at 3LD Art & Technology Center
